description.value:
A Single Trip from one place to another on a planet. Aboard a Low Orbital Flight, or Luxury Sedan, will get you there quickly and in good comfort.

Requirements

Cost of service may vary with location and the honesty/charitability of those that offer it.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: 150 T
